mapper.select: select no as orderNo, order_nm as orderNm, addr_gb as addrGb, addr as addr, tel_num as telNum, memo as memo, order_dt as orderDate, tot_pay_prc as totPayPrc, (select user_id from tcst0001 where no = user_no) as orderUserId from tcst0201 order by orderDate desc

select ord_no as orderNo, (select prd_nm from tpdt0001 where no = pdt_no) as productNm, return_fl as returnFl, ord_amt as orderAmt, ord_st as orderSt, pay_prc as payPrc, pdt_opt_nm as productOptNm from tcst0202 where ord_no = #{productNo}
mapper.insert:
insert into tcst0201(order_nm, addr_gb, addr, tel_num, memo, order_dt, tot_pay_prc, del_fl, user_no) values (#{orderNm}, #{addrGb}, #{addr}, #{telNum}, #{memo}, to_char(now(), 'YYYYMMDD'), #{totPayPrc}, 'N', #{userNo})
select currval(pg_get_serial_sequence('tcst0201','no'))

insert into tcst0202(ord_no, pdt_opt_no, return_fl, ord_amt, ord_st, pay_prc, pdt_opt_nm, del_fl) values
(#{orderNo}, #{item.productOptNo}, 'N', #{item.orderAmt}, 'A', #{item.payPrc}, #{item.productOptNm}, 'N')
mapper.select: select no as orderNo, order_nm as orderNm, addr_gb as addrGb, addr as addr, tel_num as telNum, memo as memo, order_dt as orderDate, tot_pay_prc as totPayPrc from tcst0201 where del_fl = 'N' and user_no = #{userNo}

select a.ord_no as orderNo, a.pdt_opt_no as productOptNo, c.no as productNo, c.prd_nm as productNm, a.return_fl as returnFl, a.ord_amt as orderAmt, a.ord_st as orderSt, a.pay_prc as payPrc, a.pdt_opt_nm as productOptNm from tcst0202 a left outer join tpdt0002 b on a.ord_no = b.no left outer join tpdt0001 c on b.pdt_no = c.no where a.del_fl = 'N' and a.ord_no = #{orderNo}
select type_cd as typeCd, ori_nm as oriNm, save_url as saveUrl, ext_nm as extNm from timg0001 where del_fl = 'N' and pdt_no = #{productNo}
